description: PortworxVolumeSource represents a Portworx volume resource.

fsType.description: FSType represents the filesystem type to mount Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Implicitly inferred to be 'ext4' if unspecified.

readOnly.description: Defaults to false (read/write). ReadOnly here will force the ReadOnly setting in VolumeMounts.

volumeID.description: VolumeID uniquely identifies a Portworx volume
